metadata.title: CVE-2014-8179 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Docker Engine before 1.8.3 and CS Docker Engine before 1.6.2-CS7 does notproperly validate and extract the manifest object from its JSONrepresentation during a pull, which allows attackers to inject newattributes in a JSON object and bypass pull-by-digest validation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8179` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.10.3-0ubuntu6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.3-0ubuntu6').
